name: Into the Fire (Growmotion Games)
description:
Game jam entry for SA Game Jam 2020. 

On an island trip a dormant volcano has erupted. The player has to get up the mountain to the top of the volcano to rescue their companion, then return to safety.  Prototype/jam entry build.  

Work-in-progress. Action runner/adventure game prototype. 

72 Hour Jam Entry. Hobbyist category. 

Theme: Returning from the Brink. The theme is applied in 2 ways: 1.The journey (moving into danger to rescue someone, and returning from the edge), and 2. The brink as an edge (along cliffside, and later volcano edge). Comeback mechanic - recovery/returning after falling off cliff edge. 

Tools: 

Unreal Engine 

Blender
